channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hidden hole in ground covered in leaves, 29th September
item.description:
There is a hole in the ground here. I didn't see it as it was covered in leaves. I stumbled into it and have hurt my back. This park has several similar holes that people get caught out with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chestnut Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 29th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 days plus temporary footway closure please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation and brambles back to boundary approximately 28 metres x3 metres (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pothole is on the PUBLIC FOOTPATH between St Mary's Junior and Infant Schools, 28th September
item.description:
There is a large hole in the public footpath between St Mary's Infant and Junior Schools which has occurred because of water leaking out of an adjacent manhole (the water meter fro one of the Schools). At night its deep enough for someone not to see it and sustain a nasty trip/fall. Its been there for 2-3 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
